---
title: Niche Technology
author: ''
date: '2022-10-25'
slug: niche_technology
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Niche Technology. The average
  contract duration was 3 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $3.8M. The longest
  contract was 5 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $6.2M.
lookup_name: 'NICHE TECHNOLOGY'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.4M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '50%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '75%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '2.7M'
s424_mean_duration: '3'
s421_mean_contract_value: '3.8M'
s425_max_duration: '5'
s422_max_contract_value: '6.2M'
---
